pr_title: 1537: Fixing Null AmmoType NPE in Hangar Tab

timeline.message: Code cleanup and hiding empty menus as required
Adding default return for a null ammo type to prevent NPE
Swapping back to desired object comparison using identity

timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: Because I overrode the method it is calling to make 20 a default value. Better to use that instead of a magic number
replies.author: Windchild292
